name: Joy-N Help Me
description:
"Hello,
can you hear me? My name is Joy-N. I don't understand how I ended up in this place. I was playing, and suddenly a big storm started. I got hit somehow, and I can't explain what happened. I just woke up now, and everything around me looks different. The world seems colorless. Maybe I'm dreaming, maybe not, but everything feels very realistic. I've started to feel scared and very lonely. Can you please help me find a way out of this colorless world?"

-ADVENTURE
Complete each level to unlock the next
Each level has its difficulty that you need to overcome

-GOAL
Collect all the bubbles and find the word "J O Y N"
Collect all the jars to help Joy find her way
Find the secret keys

-ACHIEVEMENTS
Try to complete the game 100%
If you can't finish it, try harder, Joy needs you.
